# response

Interfaces for LLM responses.

This module defines interfaces for the responses returned by language models,
including methods for formatting the response according to a specified format.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="responses/response/index" symbolName="Tool" /> Tool

Tool instance with arguments provided by an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="responses/response/index" symbolName="Dataclass" /> Dataclass

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="responses/response/index" symbolName="BaseResponse" /> BaseResponse

The response generated by an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Class" path="responses/response/index" symbolName="Response" /> Response

The response generated by an LLM.
